== General Information ==

<nowiki>[[http://www.markshuttleworth.com/archives/1195/|"Raring Ringtail"]]</nowiki> is the code name for Ubuntu 13.04, which <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-announce/2013-April/000171.html|was released]]</nowiki> on 25 April 2013.

More Kubuntu information can also be found at <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Kubuntuguide|Kubuntuguide]]</nowiki>.
